<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Osiris (Lord of the Living)](/Deities.aspx?ID=56)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Ensure the health of crops and vegetation, protect the bodies and souls of the worthy dead, avenge the wrongly murdered

**Anathema** Dismember a creature, desecrate a corpse, show ingratitude for a sincere gift

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Favored Weapon** [Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=19)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=40), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=51)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291)

- **2nd**
[False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108)

- **6th**
[Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=331)

</column>
name: Osiris (Lord of the Living)
